pattern.title: External adapter type not a base type

rule.context: xs:*[(self::xs:extension or self::xs:restriction) and (nf:has-effective-conformance-target-identifier(., xs:anyURI('https://docs.oasis-open.org/niemopen/ns/specification/NDR/6.0/#ReferenceSchemaDocument')) or nf:has-effective-conformance-target-identifier(., xs:anyURI('https://docs.oasis-open.org/niemopen/ns/specification/NDR/6.0/#ExtensionSchemaDocument'))) and (some $base-qname in resolve-QName(@base, .), $base-namespace in namespace-uri-from-QName($base-qname) satisfies not($base-namespace = (nf:get-target-namespace(.), xs:anyURI('http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema'))))]
rule.assert: Rule 9-52: An external adapter type definition MUST NOT be a base type definition.
